text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires stating that the Windsor Framework was negotiated to ease the burden of the NI Protocol, was adopted, and was approved by the UK Parliament on 22 March 2023. The candidate answer states the Framework was agreed on 27 February 2023 and that the core legal instruments (Joint Committee Decisions) were adopted on 24 March 2023. While the exact date of 'adoption' (27 Feb vs 24 Mar) differs slightly from the specific date mentioned in the criterion (22 Mar), the answer clearly identifies the Windsor Framework, its purpose (replacing the Protocol arrangements), and cites the primary legal instruments adopted in March 2023, which fulfills the spirit and substance of the requirement regarding the negotiation, adoption, and legal basis of the Framework.", "criterion_id": "dad0e919-f700-46a6-aa9a-2b1456a237f3"}
